name: The Void (itch) (Apenas Alguem)
description:
This game will tell the story of Jhon and the friends who accompany him on his never-ending journey. Jhon is an immortal being that masters many different spells and abilities, his goal is to achieve inner peace and have a carefree life, a goal that seems simple but will prove more complex and complicated as more and more problems come his way.

This game is available in Portuguese and English.

This game is free, but if you like it and want to show your support, you can do so through my Patreon or Buy Me a Coffee:

Buy Me a Coffee

Patreon
